protocol.text: The data were analyzed using MAS 5.0 (Microarray Suite version 5.0) with in its analysis software (GCOS = GeneChip Operating System). The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 100. ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity ABS_CALL =  DETECTION P-VALUE =
Leaves and roots were harvested separately, frozen in liquid nitrogen and stored in a freezer (-80C) till further processing.

Plants were grown on half strength Murashige-Skoog medium, containing 1% sucrose, without vitamin B6, at long day conditions (16 h light/8 h darkness; 120 uM light; 22C/18C day/night temparture) for 10 days after germination.
Total RNA extraction was performed using a NucleoSpin RNA Plant extraction kit from Macherey Nagel according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA samples were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 500 ng total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, 16 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Arabidopsis Genome Array GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G.
